ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Chief guard
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has proven {PAWN_gender ? his : her} superiority and strength in wielding traditional tribal weapons. This circumstance forces the chief, following ancient traditions, to appoint [PAWN_nameDef] to the post of bodyguard.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Horse archer
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the service of an ambitious and warlike tribe. They were raising an army to march against the world they knew.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Payed assassin
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is becoming a serious threat to the hostile community. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} was hired for horrific nightly murders to force the community into surrender.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Outpost keeper
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] immediately after growing up, assigned to guard one of the signal towers on the edge of the tribe's holdings. For many years {PAWN_gender ? he : she} practices longbow.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Heavy spearman
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: The [PAWN_nameDef] tribe had a small but highly trained and superior army to defend themselves, relying more on negotiation. [PAWN_nameDef] enlists as a spear warrior and spends long periods of time defending distant villages.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Forest hunter
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends most of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} youth in the forest, hunting large animals and periodically bringing them to a neighboring tribe to exchange for other goods.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Battle shaman
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: It may be that [PAWN_nameDef] spells and wards often did not work against opponents, but [PAWN_nameDef] could always convince them by another means, even if it would be the last minutes for the enemy.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Bandit
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been leading a bandit group for a long time, stopping caravans of neighboring tribal communities and hiding in the forest with loot.

ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.title: Rider
ProjectParagon.Core.FightSystem.BattleBa.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has participated in many raids as part of a small nomadic tribal force.
